comments:
See attached screenshot. This has happened to me on two different occasions 
when using I20020115. TabItems disappear without editor closing. It happens 
when I'm closing/opening editors. I don't have steps to reproduce this bug, 
but it would be worth reviewing changes in this area. I got this in the log - 
not sure if it is related:

editor continues to function normally. can edit, save, and eventually close.

The bug is in WorkbenchPartReference which is used by editors and views. 
Marking as dup of bug 27320.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 27320 ***
